response:
{
  "menus": [
    {
      "name": "Chicken and Broccoli Rice Bowl",
      "description": "A simple one-pan meal with tender chicken, fluffy rice, and crisp broccoli in a light sauce.",
      "servings": 2,
      "cookingTime": 35,
      "difficulty": "easy",
      "ingredients": [
        "chicken breast: 300g",
        "rice: 1 cup",
        "broccoli: 2 cups florets",
        "garlic: 2 cloves",
        "soy sauce: 2 tbsp",
        "vegetable oil: 2 tbsp",
        "water: 2 cups",
        "salt: to taste",
        "pepper: to taste"
      ],
      "instructions": [
        "Cut chicken breast into bite-sized pieces and season with salt and pepper",
        "Heat 1 tbsp oil in a large pan over medium-high heat",
        "Cook chicken pieces until golden and cooked through, about 6-8 minutes, then remove and set aside",
        "In the same pan, add remaining oil and minced garlic, cook for 30 seconds until fragrant",
        "Add rice and stir to coat with oil for 1 minute",
        "Pour in 2 cups water, bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low",
        "Cover and simmer for 15 minutes",
        "Add broccoli florets on top of rice, cover again and cook for 5 more minutes until broccoli is tender",
        "Return chicken to pan, drizzle with soy sauce",
        "Gently fold everything together and cook for 2 minutes to heat through",
        "Taste and adjust seasoning with salt and pepper",
        "Serve hot in bowls"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Teriyaki Chicken with Steamed Rice and Broccoli",
      "description": "Glazed chicken with a sweet and savory teriyaki sauce, served alongside steamed rice and broccoli.",
      "servings": 2,
      "cookingTime": 30,
      "difficulty": "easy",
      "ingredients": [
        "chicken breast: 300g",
        "rice: 1 cup",
        "broccoli: 2 cups florets",
        "soy sauce: 3 tbsp",
        "water: 3 tbsp",
        "garlic: 1 clove",
        "vegetable oil: 1 tbsp",
        "salt: pinch",
        "pepper: pinch"
      ],
      "instructions": [
        "Cook rice according to package directions",
        "Cut chicken breast into strips and season with salt and pepper",
        "In a small bowl, mix soy sauce, water, and minced garlic to make teriyaki sauce",
        "Heat oil in a pan over medium-high heat",
        "Add chicken strips and cook for 4-5 minutes until browned on all sides",
        "Pour teriyaki sauce over chicken and reduce heat to medium",
        "Let sauce simmer and reduce for 5-7 minutes, turning chicken occasionally until glazed",
        "Meanwhile, bring a pot of salted water to boil",
        "Add broccoli florets and cook for 3-4 minutes until tender-crisp",
        "Drain broccoli well",
        "Divide rice between two plates",
        "Top with glazed chicken and steamed broccoli",
        "Drizzle any remaining sauce from pan over the chicken and serve"
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Garlic Chicken Fried Rice with Broccoli",
      "description": "A quick stir-fried rice dish with chicken and broccoli, packed with garlic flavor.",
      "servings": 2,
      "cookingTime": 40,
      "difficulty": "easy",
      "ingredients": [
        "rice: 1.5 cups",
        "chicken breast: 250g",
        "broccoli: 1.5 cups florets",
        "garlic: 4 cloves",
        "soy sauce: 2 tbsp",
        "vegetable oil: 3 tbsp",
        "salt: to taste",
        "pepper: to taste"
      ],
      "instructions": [
        "Cook rice according to package directions, spread on a plate to cool for 10 minutes",
        "Cut chicken into small cubes and season with salt and pepper",
        "Cut broccoli into small florets and mince garlic",
        "Heat 1 tbsp oil in a wok or large pan over high heat",
        "Add chicken and cook for 5-6 minutes until fully cooked, then remove and set aside",
        "Add another tbsp of oil to the wok",
        "Add broccoli florets and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until tender-crisp, remove and set aside",
        "Add remaining oil to wok, add minced garlic and stir-fry for 30 seconds until fragrant",
        "Add cooled rice, breaking up any clumps with spatula",
        "Stir-fry rice for 3-4 minutes until grains are separated and slightly crispy",
        "Return chicken and broccoli to wok",
        "Drizzle soy sauce around the edge of wok and toss everything together",
        "Continue stir-frying for 2 minutes until well combined and heated through",
        "Taste and adjust seasoning with salt and pepper, serve immediately"
      ]
    }
  ]
}
